text: Metropolitan Baguio, or also known as Metro Baguio, is one of the metropolitan area particularly in North Luzon in the island state of Luzon in the Philippines , the city of Baguio is known as the "Summer Capital of the Philippines" and the regional capital of Northern Luzon. ==Municipalities== There are the Blisst area of the metropolitan, the city of Baguio, Sablan, La Trinidad, Tuba and Itogon. Baguio Category:Benguet
title: Metro Baguio
